Package com.game

Class GameNode

java.lang.Object
com.game.GameNode
All Implemented Interfaces:
ija.ija2024.tool.common.Observable, ija.ija2024.tool.common.ToolField
public class GameNode extends Object implements ija.ija2024.tool.common.ToolField
Class representing a single node on a game board. Each node have its position, type, its connectors and a type.

  • Constructor Details

    • GameNode

      public GameNode()

  • Method Details

    • connectorsType

      public int connectorsType()
      Returns a type of the connections of this node.
      Returns:
      an integer representing a type of connectors the node has.
      • 0 - no connectors
      • 1 - one connector
      • 2 - two connectors on opposing sides
      • 3 - two connectors on bordering sides
      • 4 - three connectors
      • 5 - four connectors

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Returns a string describing the current state and type of this node.
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:
      a string that includes all important info about the GameNode
